text: Dwayne Arlan Alons (October 30, 1946 - November 29, 2014) was an American politician. He was the Iowa State Representative from the 4th District. He was a member of the Republican party. Alons served in the Iowa House of Representatives since 1999. He was a Brigadier General in the Iowa Air National Guard and served as Chief of Staff at its headquarters. Alons died of kidney cancer on November 29, 2014 in Sioux Center, Iowa, aged 68. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from kidney cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Iowa Category:Politicians from Iowa Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Dwayne Alons
